snippet: The prime minister fired his defense secretary as the government drew closer to a collision with the powerful military.
abstract: Pakistan's Prime Min Yousaf Raza Gilani fires his defense secretary Naeem Khalid Lodhi, a retired general and confidant of Pakistan's army chief, as the civilian government draws closer to a collision with the country's powerful military leadership; military officials warn the army is likely to refuse to work with his replacement, Nargis Sethi.

byline.contributor: J. David Goodman contributed reporting from New York.

lead_paragraph: The prime minister fired his defense secretary as the government drew closer to a collision with the powerful military.

headline.seo: Pakistan Fires Defense Official, Angering Army
headline.main: Secretary’s Ouster in Pakistan Adds to Tension With Army
headline.print_headline: Pakistani Prime Minister Fires Defense Official, Stoking Tensions With Army
